subject: Bug Fixes
message: Added a number of statuses and fixed the report download filter.

subject: Add a Vendor
message: Certain users can now add vendors by hand.

subject: Multi Vote Added
message: Vote Machine can now handle multiple voting events at once.

subject: Reports & Status
message: Added reports section.  Vendor and Vote reports available.  Added status select on vendor view for individual modifications.

subject: New Filter
message: Added category filter to vendor list.  Added ability to click pie-chart section to automatically filter vendor list to status/category.

subject: Bug Fixes
message: Fixed vote lockout.  Fixed min votes start at 1.  Removed duplicate categories.

subject: Bug and Feature Form
message: Bug Report/Feature Request

subject: Clear vendor list
message: Added a menu item to forcibly clear the vendor list.  Requires user to have the EDIT STAFF and EDIT VENDOR roles.

subject: Working on image loader
message: Started working on the image loader, lots of issues with it, but not going to give up.  Will probably add a method of stripping out URLs from the photo data and present them as a clickable link.

subject: Changelog display
message: Display change log on dashboard index page.
